# Welcome to IssueVista Discussions!

## Welcome to IssueVista!

We're excited to have you here! This is the place to connect with the IssueVista community.

### What is IssueVista?

IssueVista helps developers discover beginner-friendly GitHub issues. Whether you're new to open source or looking for your next contribution, we've got you covered.

### How to Use Discussions

| Category          | Purpose                      |
| ----------------- | ---------------------------- |
| **Announcements** | Project updates and releases |
| **Q&A**           | Ask questions, get answers   |
| **Ideas**         | Share feature suggestions    |
| **Show and Tell** | Share your contributions     |
| **General**       | Everything else              |

### Quick Links

- [Project Board](https://github.com/orgs/VibeTensor/projects/2) - View roadmap and sprints
- [Contributing Guide](https://github.com/VibeTensor/IssueVista/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [Good First Issues](https://github.com/VibeTensor/IssueVista/labels/good%20first%20issue) - Start here!

### Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and inclusive
- Search before posting
- Use appropriate categories
- Follow our [Code of Conduct](https://github.com/VibeTensor/IssueVista/blob/master/CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)

### Introduce Yourself!

Drop a comment below and tell us:

- Your name and background
- What brought you to IssueVista
- What you're hoping to contribute or learn

Looking forward to building together!

---

_Maintained by [@ascender1729](https://github.com/ascender1729) | [VibeTensor](https://github.com/VibeTensor)_
